Using Lava Release, the user can either expel acid from their mouth as a projectile,<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 41, pages 14-15</ref> or create the substance from beneath the ground to erupt as a large explosion. The liquid is capable of melting objects.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 40, pages 10-12</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]'', while the projectile variation retains the name, the stream variation is referred to as {{translation|'''Lava Release: Muddy Stream Wave'''|溶遁・濁流波}}, despite both sharing the same name in the manga and anime.
